summary: Humberto Fuentes is a wealthy doctor whose wife has recently died. In spite of the advice of his children, he takes a trip to visit his former students who now work in impoverished villages... See full summary »
cast: Federico Luppi|Damián Delgado|Dan Rivera González|Tania Cruz|Damián Alcázar|Mandy Patinkin|Kathryn Grody|Iguandili López|Nandi Luna Ramírez|Rafael de Quevedo|Carmen Madrid|Esteban Soberanes|Alejandro Springall|Maricruz Nájera|Jacqueline Voltaire|Roberto Sosa|Iván Arango|Lizzie Curry Martinez|Luis Ramírez|Humberto Romero|Gabriel Cosme|Horacio Trujillo|Efrine Elfaro|Pedro Hernández|Dionisios|Loló Navarro|Maggie Renzi|Shari Gray|Paco Mauri|Gilma Tuyub Castillo|Armando Martínez Velásquez|Luis Felipe Tovar|Fernando Medel|David Villalpando|Raúl Sánchez|Diego Méndez Guzmán|Mariano López de la Cruz|Antonio de la Torre López|Ermenehildo Sáenz Guzmán|Cristóbal Guzmán Mesa|Domingo Pérez Sánchez|Óscar García Ortega|Miguel Xocua|Guadalupe Xocua|Celeste Cornelio Sánchez|Nazario Montiel|Francisco Váldez|José Alberto Acosta
title: Hombres armados
